DOC.brief_title: Study Of An NK-1 Anti-Emetic Medication For The Prevention Of Post-Operative Nausea And Vomiting In Female Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A Multicenter , Randomized , Double-blind , Double-dummy , Placebo-controlled , Parallel Group , Phase II Study Evaluate Safety , Efficacy , Pharmacokinetics Oral ( 25 mg ) Intravenous ( 3 mg 18 mg ) Formulations Neurokinin-1 Receptor Antagonist , GW597599 , When Administered Intravenous Ondansetron Hydrochloride Prevention Post-operative Nausea Vomiting Post-discharge Nausea Vomiting Female Subjects Known Risk Factors PONV Who Undergoing Surgical Procedures Associated Increased Emetogenic Risk
DOC.criteria: know risk factor PONV . Undergoing gynecological gallbladder surgery .
